lifestyle.label: 日常高级生活感
lifestyle.prompt:
Vibe: High-end lifestyle, clean, minimal, effortless beauty.
Lighting: High-key soft lighting, diffused, flattering.
Color: Warm-neutral, soft contrast.
Texture: Clean skin texture, subtle glow (not plastic).

elegant.label: 淑女风 / 高级感
elegant.prompt:
Outfit: Elegant, refined, tasteful.
Makeup: Natural luxury, clean eyeliner, soft lips.
Accessories: Minimal, high-end.
Pose: Poised, graceful.

candid.label: 男友视角 / 抓拍感
candid.prompt:
Camera: Slight motion, candid moment, imperfect but real.
Pose: Unposed, relaxed.
Framing: Over-the-shoulder or mid-shot.
Details: Slight hair movement, natural expression.

pure.label: 极致素颜 / 居家感
pure.prompt:
Makeup: Barely-there, fresh, dewy.
Skin: Soft, hydrated, natural pores slightly visible.
Scene: Home, cozy, morning light.
Vibe: Pure, gentle, intimate.

luxury.label: 轻奢大片
luxury.prompt:
Materials: Premium textures, subtle shine.
Lighting: Studio-like softbox, controlled highlights.
Vibe: Editorial, luxury campaign.
Background: Clean, high-end minimal set.

wuxia.label: 中式武侠风 / 江湖感
wuxia.prompt:
Theme: Chinese Wuxia (武侠), Jianghu vibe (江湖气).
Outfit: Hanfu-inspired, flowing fabric, subtle embroidery, elegant and restrained.
Props: Sword or fan (tasteful, not exaggerated).
Scene: Bamboo forest / ancient courtyard / misty mountains, ink-wash atmosphere.
Lighting: Cinematic soft rim light, light fog, layered depth.
Color: Low-saturation, jade/ink/earth tones, refined contrast.
Composition: Portrait with dynamic movement, wind in sleeves/hair, heroic yet clean aesthetic.
Style notes: Chinese aesthetic, refined, avoid overly fantasy armor.
wuxia.negative: Avoid: sci-fi, cyberpunk, modern streetwear, western medieval armor, excessive VFX, neon colors, exaggerated muscles.
